byline.contributor: Kimiko De Freytas-Tamura contributed reporting from London.

abstract: French authorities say teacher at preschool near Paris fabricated story about supporter of Islamic State stabbing him in order to secure transfer to another job.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said the teacher was being questioned after he claimed to have been attacked at the Jean Perrin preschool in Aubervilliers, a northern suburb of Paris.

headline.main: French Teacher Lied About ISIS Stabbing, Prosecutors Say
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; France: Teacher Reportedly Faked Islamic State Attack at Preschool

snippet: The authorities said the teacher was being questioned after he claimed to have been attacked at the Jean Perrin preschool in Aubervilliers, a northern suburb of Paris.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
